name: Alchymy
description:
Alchymy

Roguelike with chemistry-based battle mechanics

**Instructions so far on how to play:

  • Press "i" to bring up inventory menu
  • Press "l" (el) to look at ground and bring up ground menu
  • Press "escape" to exit menus
  • When in "i" inventory and "l" look menus,  use up/down arrow keys to select item
  • Use "d" to drop when in inventory
  • Use "g" to get when in look mode

Coming Next:
